14 1 2 7 78 1332 188 1335 206 (

14 1 2 9 95 1452 185 1561 209 approach

14 1 3 2 96 910 216 982 241 partly
14 1 3 3 96 993 216 1074 235 related
14 1 3 4 96 1085 218 1109 235 to
14 1 3 5 96 1120 216 1168 235 that
14 1 3 6 97 1181 215 1204 235 of
14 1 3 7 96 1213 216 1258 236 Ref.
14 1 3 8 68 1274 214 1319 242 [83],
14 1 3 9 96 1332 216 1401 235 which
14 1 3 10 93 1412 216 1498 236 studied
14 1 3 11 92 1510 218 1560 235 two-
14 1 4 1 96 881 248 975 267 electron
14 1 4 2 96 987 248 1062 267 bound
14 1 4 3 96 1074 250 1148 268 states.
14 1 4 4 96 1168 248 1214 267 The
14 1 4 5 95 1226 249 1285 267 main
14 1 4 6 95 1297 248 1457 272 simplification
14 1 4 7 96 1469 248 1560 267 consists
14 1 5 1 96 881 279 904 299 of
14 1 5 2 96 911 280 1019 305 replacing
14 1 5 3 96 1028 280 1065 299 the
14 1 5 4 96 1074 280 1174 300 screened
14 1 5 5 96 1184 279 1290 300 Coulomb
14 1 5 6 96 1299 280 1405 304 potential
14 1 5 7 97 1415 281 1436 299 in
14 1 5 8 97 1445 280 1488 299 real
14 1 5 9 96 1497 287 1560 304 space
14 1 6 1 96 881 312 909 337 by
14 1 6 2 96 917 319 930 331 a
14 1 6 3 96 938 312 997 331 delta
14 1 6 4 96 1004 311 1102 331 function
14 1 6 5 96 1110 312 1222 336 potential.
14 1 6 6 96 1237 312 1289 331 This
14 1 6 7 96 1298 313 1471 336 approximation
14 1 6 8 96 1479 312 1496 331 is
14 1 6 9 96 1504 312 1560 331 valid
14 1 7 1 96 882 346 903 363 at
14 1 7 2 96 914 344 988 369 length
14 1 7 3 96 998 344 1064 363 scales
14 1 7 4 96 1074 344 1122 363 that
14 1 7 5 96 1133 343 1164 363 far
14 1 7 6 96 1174 344 1252 363 exceed
14 1 7 7 96 1262 344 1298 363 the
14 1 7 8 96 1308 345 1418 369 screening
14 1 7 9 93 1428 344 1508 369 length,
14 1 7 10 38 1519 345 1559 368 i.e.,
14 1 8 1 95 881 375 913 395 for
14 1 8 2 95 927 378 1037 395 momenta
14 1 8 3 96 1050 376 1099 395 that
14 1 8 4 96 1114 383 1149 395 are
14 1 8 5 96 1163 376 1225 395 small
